title: PlayStation's 25th Anniversary Memories - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.03.19
description:
Try Hims today by starting out with a FREE online visit by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

Go to http://tipsyelves.com/games now to get 20% off your entire order!

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Imran and Greg talk about your PlayStation memories and Riot's lawsuit settlement, Resident Evil 3 Remake, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:26 - Riot Settles Lawsuit, Will Pay Every Female Employee Since 2014 with $10 Million Fund
00:15:41 - RE3 Remake Leaks
00:22:35 - Persona 5 Royal Launch Date
00:28:23 - Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel 3 coming to Switch
00:30:28 - Quantic Dream has to pay former employee for harassment
00:37:59 - Out today
00:41:38 -  Hims
00:43:13 - Tipsy Elves
00:44:39 - Manscaped
 Reader mail   -
00:46:50 - “My PlayStation memory is from this year…” - Style65
00:48:16 - “My favorite PlayStation memory is from way back in 2001…” - Lynkar6469
00:57:49 - “I distinctly remember my first encounter with Playstation and PS2. It was Super Bowl 2004…” - Anakin jmt
01:00:36 - “The one event I want to focus on today will take us way back into the past of January 28th, 2019…” - Frankfurtter
01:02:10 - “Favorite PlayStation Memories for the 25th Anniversary: Pretty much every PSX!” - Trevor Starkey
01:06:40 - Squad Up: William DiAngelo - PSN - WilliamDiAngelo
01:07:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!

Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
